column4: I don't understand the program installation structure of ubuntu. How do you view a list of all programs installed, like in windows start menu?
Applications, shortcuts and system have pretty much every application, except for the lesser known ones or console commands for which you have to know the appropriate commands
system utilities and many programs store their executable in /bin, /sbin or /usr/bin. You can start from there and type "man command" to know more about a command ex.: man man
